content: I’ve been planning to do this in 2017 all along. I’ll be taking on a series of learning goals and challenges come March and writing about my progress — what I’ve learnt and the obstacles I’ve faced. Hopefully this will inspire others to challenge themselves also. With the 52 week writing challenge, there will be more people writing and holding me accountable. I’m more confident that I will be fully committed to this goal. Cheers to writing in 2017! Edit: My first story of 2017 is out — check out why I’m taking the writing challenge. Why I Will Be Writing in 2017“There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.”medium.com
